Name: Sigma Impact
About the game: Sigma Impact is a physics-based combat roguelite set in a dungeon of glass. Choose from a set of procedurally generated weapons and smash your way through multiple rooms and enemy encounters to make it to the final boss. Pick up new, more powerful weapons along the way, and choose your perks to augment and synergize with your favorite weapon and play-style. Features Emergent, physics-based combat 2 player local coop/pvp Dynamic music, generated in real time reacts to gameplay A unique art style with unlockable color 'moods' 5 weapon types with unique play-styles with more in development Customizable controls for gamepad or keyboard and mouse (gamepad is recommended) Procedural generation and 9 random perks to choose from make to each run unique Starting hub with training rooms and a sport/combat arena (for pvp or horde mode) Highscore table for combo/scoring system and speedrun timer NewGame+ 'Chill mode' difficulty option for a more relaxed play through
Meta Title: Sigma Impact: Aug 11, 2021, John Bishop and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sigma Impact? Check out the release date (Aug 11, 2021), developer insights from John Bishop, and a complete game summary.
